Description:
Attempting to disable scheduled scanning and other parts of Windows Defender ATP or set default actions to allow.

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Tamper Windows Defender - PSClassic
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (data like '%Set-MpPreference%' and ((data like '%-dbaf $true%' or data like '%-dbaf 1%' or data like '%-dbm $true%' or data like '%-dbm 1%' or data like '%-dips $true%' or data like '%-dips 1%' or data like '%-DisableArchiveScanning $true%' or data like '%-DisableArchiveScanning 1%' or data like '%-DisableBehaviorMonitoring $true%' or data like '%-DisableBehaviorMonitoring 1%' or data like '%-DisableBlockAtFirstSeen $true%' or data like '%-DisableBlockAtFirstSeen 1%' or data like '%-DisableCatchupFullScan $true%' or data like '%-DisableCatchupFullScan 1%' or data like '%-DisableCatchupQuickScan $true%' or data like '%-DisableCatchupQuickScan 1%' or data like '%-DisableIntrusionPreventionSystem $true%' or data like '%-DisableIntrusionPreventionSystem 1%' or data like '%-DisableIOAVProtection $true%' or data like '%-DisableIOAVProtection 1%' or data like '%-DisableRealtimeMonitoring $true%' or data like '%-DisableRealtimeMonitoring 1%' or data like '%-DisableRemovableDriveScanning $true%' or data like '%-DisableRemovableDriveScanning 1%' or data like '%-DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan $true%' or data like '%-DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan 1%' or data like '%-DisableScanningNetworkFiles $true%' or data like '%-DisableScanningNetworkFiles 1%' or data like '%-DisableScriptScanning $true%' or data like '%-DisableScriptScanning 1%' or data like '%-MAPSReporting $false%' or data like '%-MAPSReporting 0%' or data like '%-drdsc $true%' or data like '%-drdsc 1%' or data like '%-drtm $true%' or data like '%-drtm 1%' or data like '%-dscrptsc $true%' or data like '%-dscrptsc 1%' or data like '%-dsmndf $true%' or data like '%-dsmndf 1%' or data like '%-dsnf $true%' or data like '%-dsnf 1%' or data like '%-dss $true%' or data like '%-dss 1%') or (data like '%HighThreatDefaultAction Allow%' or data like '%htdefac Allow%' or data like '%LowThreatDefaultAction Allow%' or data like '%ltdefac Allow%' or data like '%ModerateThreatDefaultAction Allow%' or data like '%mtdefac Allow%' or data like '%SevereThreatDefaultAction Allow%' or data like '%stdefac Allow%')))
